Corrigendum 
 
Subject: - 
Security screening of mail - Circular no. 8/2008 
 
Based on scrutiny of instructions pertaining to mail envisaged in the   
BCAS Circular No. 8/2008 dated 10.9.2008, the following amendments shall 
be made to implement   appropriate security measures for carriage of mail by 
air:- 
 
 
Para 4 (a) of   the   above Circular 8 / 2008 shall be  replaced  as 
under:- 
 
“ 4  
(a) 
  Mail  to be transported  by an all  Cargo aircraft shall  be  
subjected  to screening  of the same  standard  as  prescribed  for 
Combi or  passenger  aircraft  mentioned  in  para  4 (b)”. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
(R.N. Dhoke, IPS)
